subclass.name: Personal Song
subclass.description: Sing yourself a little song when you head into battle. When attacking gain Jubilant, Peaceful, and Battle song buffs in that order.

subclass.name: Fae Companion
subclass.description: A fae companion that provides healing when you are low on life.
Damaging an enemy has a chance to drop candy that doubles attack speed and movement speed by 20 or heals you by 10% max health. 15s cooldown.

power.1: 22.5% chance to activate on damage dealt.
power.5000: 25% chance to activate on damage dealt.
power.10000: 27.5% chance to activate on damage dealt.
power.15000: 30% chance to activate on damage dealt.

power.35000: 50% chance to activate on damage dealt.
